text: Special ‘abhishekam’ was performed to the deities of Adi Sankara and Paramacharya of Kanchi Mutt under the auspices of Sri Sankara Mutt in Mahendramangalam, near Thottiyam on Monday. According to V. Ramamurthy, coordinator of the Mutt, special ‘yagam’ and ‘abhishekam’ were performed on the occasion of ‘Anusham’ star, the ‘tirunakshatram’ of Sri Paramacharya who stayed in this village for practising Veda for three years during his initial Peetathipathi tenure for the Sankara Mutt. A temple is under construction at Mahendramangalam using the idols of Sri Chandramouliswarar worshipped by Sri Paramacharya. Details can be had by calling 9976611657 and 9597742732.
title: Abishekam at Sankara Mutt
